data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Oncopsis Burmeister, 1838 (Homoptera: Auchenorrhyncha: Cicadellidae: Macropsinae) of Russia and adjacent countries with description of a new species from Central Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tishechkin, Dmitri Yu. (2017): Review of the genus Oncopsis Burmeister, 1838 (Homoptera: Auchenorrhyncha: Cicadellidae: Macropsinae) of Russia and adjacent countries with description of a new species from Central Asia. Zootaxa 4216 (6): 537-558, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.242421
